programme.title: Three Dates To Forever
programme.desc: Maddie Mckenzie is a hard-working presenter whose drive and talent has made her a popular radio host. John Reed is a carefree tech entrepreneur who's more interested in hosting parties. The two couldn't be more different.

programme.title: Meet Me In New York
programme.desc: Ambitious New York events planner Kelly is one of the best in the business. But when Joe, a stubborn, but influential website editor, hires her to organize his niece's birthday, Kelly soon realizes that she may have met her match.

programme.title: How to Train Your Husband
programme.desc: A marriage counselor attempts to fix her own marriage by focusing on how to change her husband.

programme.title: My One True Love
programme.desc: When 2 of the 3 things a fortune teller predicts come true, Ali wonders about the 3rd - finding true love with a man named John. Drawn to a fireman whose name isn't John, does she trust destiny or her heart?

programme.title: Christmas Harmony
programme.desc: A successful songwriter returns to her small hometown to rediscover music, family bonds and the magic of the Christmas season.

programme.title: Christmas Harmony
programme.desc: A successful songwriter returns to her small hometown to rediscover music, family bonds and the magic of the Christmas season.

programme.title: Horse Camp – A Love Tail
programme.desc: It's a new year at summer horse-riding camp but everything is different this time-a new head counselor, new friends to make, and to spice things up, the ranch hand has a crush on the head riding instructor. When he is too nervous to reveal his feelings, the campers put competition aside and rally together to help him win over her heart while building friendships that will last a lifetime.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Lizzie gets Grant and Brandon to help assemble an exercise bike that she bought with Marianne. Brandon keeps asking Grant about Marianne and how to get her attention. Emma spends the evening pretending to work on a case while Elinor actually works and prepares for a meeting with Edward. Elinor tells Emma about Edward and her feelings for him, and then by chance she sees him—with a beautiful woman.

programme.title: Austentatious
programme.desc: Emma prepares for a date with a very handsome, very successful former client. Grant is jealous and tries to convince Emma this date is too good to be true. Lizzie finds the perfect house for Darcy’s mystery woman. After spending time with Darcy, Lizzie starts to see him in a new light. Elinor tries to figure out how to act around Edward since she knows he’s been flirting with her while having a girlfriend on the side. Edward comes clean that he’s long been involved with someone else, but he really admires Elinor. Elinor is heartbroken.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: A trip to the movies should be fun, right? Well, when Ali meets a new Mike, all bets are off.

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Not everything in life can go wrong at the same time, right? Or can it?

programme.title: The Importance Of Being Mike
programme.desc: Ali gives Bad Luck Mike a second chance.

programme.title: America’s Choir
programme.desc: Dubbed "America's Choir" by President Ronald Reagan, the Mormon Tabernacle Choir celebrates 75 years of continuous weekly radio broadcasts in July 2004, the longest such run in broadcast history. Please join Walter Cronkite for an amazing look at an American institution and a national treasure.
